subject: Re: [junit] What is a better way of feeding test data to a test case
msgSnippet: ... It looks like you want to run one test for many rows of data. If so, look at the Parameterized Test Case pattern, either online or in the book /JUnit
messageBody:
mithun aiyanna wrote:
> Hi All,
> Could anyone give me suggestions as to which is a
> better way of feeding test data to a test case?

It looks like you want to run one test for many rows of data. If so,
look at the Parameterized Test Case pattern, either online or in the
book /JUnit Recipes/.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
